typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{ID de caso} as string,
		{Fecha de notificación} as string,
		{Codigo DIVIPOLA} as string,
		{Ciudad de ubicación} as string,
		{Departamento o Distrito } as string,
		{atención} as string,
		Edad as string,
		Sexo as string,
		Tipo as string,
		Estado as string,
		{País de procedencia} as string,
		FIS as string,
		{Fecha de muerte} as string,
		{Fecha diagnostico} as string,
		{Fecha recuperado} as string,
		{fecha reporte web} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CSVAPI
Unique select(mapColumn(
		Departamento = {Departamento o Distrito }
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
CSVAPI aggregate(groupBy({Departamento o Distrito }),
	sadasda = count()) ~> Unique
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{ID de caso} as string,
		{Fecha de notificación} as string,
		{Codigo DIVIPOLA} as string,
		{Ciudad de ubicación} as string,
		{Departamento o Distrito } as string,
		{atención} as string,
		Edad as string,
		Sexo as string,
		Tipo as string,
		Estado as string,
		{País de procedencia} as string,
		FIS as string,
		{Fecha de muerte} as string,
		{Fecha diagnostico} as string,
		{Fecha recuperado} as string,
		{fecha reporte web} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['singlecolumncovid.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> csvonlydept
